video.title: Sirens
video.synopsis: This raunchy comedy series follows three Chicago EMTs who frequently find themselves in absurd situations, both on and off the job.

episodes.synopsis: During Brian's first day on the rig, Johnny runs into Theresa, and Hank and the guys discuss their emergency contacts.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: After lightning strikes at a church picnic, the guys contemplate the nature of karma and decide to volunteer to teach CPR to poor kids.
episodes.title: A Bitch Named Karma

episodes.synopsis: When a patient convinces the guys to go back to his house and clear his computer's browser history, they're shocked by what they find.
episodes.title: Clear History

episodes.synopsis: A dying man's final words inspire Johnny to reconnect with his estranged dad, while Brian and Hank search for the man's long-lost love.
episodes.title: Famous Last Words

episodes.synopsis: After Johnny gets drunk and hooks up with Theresa, she proposes a no-strings-attached arrangement, and the guys urge him to go for it.
episodes.title: Alcohol Related Injury

episodes.synopsis: Johnny introduces Theresa to his father, who drops a bomb of a secret on him. Brian tries to put the moves on his work crush.
episodes.title: The Finger

episodes.synopsis: Johnny steps up for his friend when Hank gets an invitation to his ex-boyfriend's wedding. Meanwhile, Brian learns a new job skill.
episodes.title: Till Jeff Do Us Part

episodes.synopsis: The guys examine their own fears after they learn that Hank is deathly afraid of spiders and Brian comes face-to-face with his suicidal doppelgänger.
episodes.title: Itsy Bitsy Spider

episodes.synopsis: While teaching a class to prospective EMTs, the crew recalls a day that ran the gamut from the mundane to the catastrophic.
episodes.title: There's No 'I' in Cream

episodes.synopsis: After a near-death experience on the job, Theresa wants to move to Washington to join the FBI. To keep her in Chicago, Johnny proposes.
episodes.title: Shotgun Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Johnny finds the perfect apartment for him and Theresa after saving a landlord with a nut allergy. Billy starts dating Theresa's sister.
episodes.title: Superdick

episodes.synopsis: The line between caregiver and care-receiver blurs when Johnny meets an overly grateful patient and Brian escorts an injured young woman to her prom.
episodes.title: Johnny Nightingale

episodes.synopsis: Theresa doesn't think it was "destiny" that she and Johnny met, but the guys grapple with the idea of fate after several random but fortuitous events.
episodes.title: Briandipity

episodes.synopsis: Johnny and Hank are pumped to get passes to a popular health club from an overly ambitious gym rat. Voodoo tests Brian's ability to remain platonic.
episodes.title: Transcendual

episodes.synopsis: During a ride-along on Brian's first night shift, Johnny and Hank's worst nightmares are realized when they are forced to babysit a slumber party.
episodes.title: All the Single Ladies

episodes.synopsis: When Hank starts dating Johnny's landlord, Johnny has to deal with his prejudice against rich white guys. Billy helps Brian work through a heartbreak.
episodes.title: Screw the One Percent

episodes.synopsis: A car crash at a firehouse releases an unusual passenger. Billy deals with another sort of chaos when accompanying Theresa and Maeve to a sample sale.
episodes.title: Let Pythons Be Pythons

episodes.synopsis: After they save a mobster, Brian proposes some changes to the rig, Hank considers the worst person he ever helped, and Billy looks for a pony.
episodes.title: Hypocritical Oath

episodes.synopsis: A drunken brawl between Cubs and Sox fans reverberates at a family barbecue where petty disputes play out over a new gas grill and a big punch bowl.
episodes.title: Charbroiled

episodes.synopsis: Things get mixed up when Johnny, Theresa, Billy and Maeve start playing tennis, Cash helps Hank shop for his mom's birthday, and Brian subs for Cash.
episodes.title: Balls

episodes.synopsis: When Johnny's dad goes into a coma, the family deals with its grief by gambling. Meanwhile, the guys can't get an unfortunate song out of their heads.
episodes.title: Six Feet Over/Under

episodes.synopsis: After Johnny sees how much respect Theresa gets on the job, he convinces the guys to revive an old program in order to get a little respect for EMTs.
episodes.title: No Love

episodes.synopsis: After treating a man with a deep fear of hospitals, Brian confronts his fear of moving out. Johnny's fear is realized when Billy temporarily moves in.
episodes.title: Sub-Primal Fears
